New Records: Erling Haaland became Norway's highest international scorer
Key Match Events: Arnautovic (8', 49' pen.), Lienhart (58'), Posch (62'), Gregoritsch (71') scored for Austria
Berge (28'), Hanche-Olsen (47'), Myhre (88') received yellow cards for Norway
Pre-Game Insights: Austria need a win to stay in the mix for a top-two finish next month
Norway can make it three wins from three this weekend, with Erling Haaland and co. in form
Ralf Rangnick's side are level on points with Slovenia, and both teams are vying to join Norway in the hunt for automatic promotion
Post-Match Reflections: Austria's win was a convincing one, with a 5-1 scoreline showing their dominance
Norway's loss means they will need to regroup and focus for their next match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Raiffeisen Arena in Austria
The attendance and weather conditions were not mentioned in the article
